sub_title: Senior Fullstack Engineer at Backbase // Always looking for cool stuff to build
summary:
I am Nicolás a Fullstack engineer from Uruguay working on software that makes an impact.
With over 14 years of experience, I'm all about taking up challenges and complex projects;  I'm passionate about architecture, neat and well-tested code, trying bleeding-edge technologies, and giving something back through my open source contributions.  

I've been focusing mainly on documentation and tooling for documentation creation for the past 3 years.

And because not everything is code, I'm also passionate about robotics, drones, and building stuff.

https://ntorres.dev/
@MudoCampo podcast

school.name: Facultad de Ingeniería, Universidad de la República

education.degree_name: Bachiller en Mantenimiento y Procesamiento Informático

projects.title: FORMA - Courses Registration and Administration Software
projects.description:
Platform that allows users to register to courses and evaluate the teachers performance. 
It enables the administrators to manage the submissions, schedule new course registrations and handle the course payments.
Software developed for Facultad de Arquitectura, Diseño y Urbanismo de la Universidad de la República. 
Now being used in several other Universities.

contributors.headline: Senior Fullstack Engineer at Backbase // Always looking for cool stuff to build

projects.title: Blitz Guard - The centralized permission based authentication for Blitz.js
projects.description:
Blitz Guard is an authorization library which allows or restricts access to specific resources. It implements Attribute-based access control

It aims to reduce boilerplate and hard to understand authorization rules by having only a single source of truth in the Ability file

contributors.headline: Senior Fullstack Engineer at Backbase // Always looking for cool stuff to build

profile_positions.description:
Backbase.io - Explore and understand the features and capabilities packed into our products.

A platform that allows clients and prospective clients to get to know our offering as well as providing developers with the technical documentation and tools needed to work with our products.

It's the consolidation of all the previous projects into a single platform that involves technical and functional documentation for APIs, libraries, and our software in general.

Built with Next.js, Angular, Node.js, Nginx, Postgres, and Prisma.
profile_positions.title: Backbase.io - Explore and understand the features and capabilities (Senior Fullstack Engineer)

profile_positions.description: In-house documentation building tool that builds +50k pages from Asciidoc documents. Allows writers and contributors to modify and validate the documentation locally with changes in real-time and enables collaboration through preview deployments.
profile_positions.title: Documentation Builder - In-house documentation building tool (SFE, Tech Lead)

profile_positions.description:
Building the next-gen Developer Hub, the knowledge center that powers the work of thousands of developers in Backbase and our clients. Responsible for creating a unified developer experience, bringing order and coherence to all the knowledge in our company regarding functional and technical documentation as well as Open API specifications.

Built with Next.js, Typescript, NX, Prisma, and Express.

We also provide search across all our documentation through Elasticsearch and an in-house indexer that crawls thousands of pages every day.
profile_positions.title: Developer Hub - Powering the work of thousands of developers (SFE, Tech Lead)

profile_positions.description:
It's a centralized catalog that keeps track of our deliverables, libraries, and teams that own them. It's the main source of truth for our ecosystem and the go-to location for every team to see all services that they own and related resources.

We provide discoverability and accountability to teams; no more software hiding in the dark corners of the tech stack.

The Backbase software catalog was built on top of Backstage.io using React and Nodejs and Docker

Our infrastructure consists of AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Github Actions, Jenkins.

I was responsible for the initial prototype, setup, deployment, and many other modifications to the catalog. I have very good architectural knowledge of the software, did OSS contributions and proposed changes to the application.
profile_positions.title: Software catalog - Manage all your software, all in one place (Senior Full Stack Engineer)

profile_positions.description:
Providing maintenance to our legacy systems and tools used by Technical Writers to generate documentation from Asciidoc.

Built on top of Discourse forums with Ember.js and Ruby on Rails using Engines.
profile_positions.title: Community and Documentation - Legacy platform (Full Stack Engineer)

profile_positions.description: It is a digital platform that connects talents, entrepreneurs, researchers, businessmen, and investors to share their projects and experiences, promoting joint work to promote research and innovation in the country. Built with Next.js (React) and GraphQL with Apollo, Ruby on Rails as a backend.
profile_positions.title: Trama - Connecting entrepreneurs and researchers with investors and talent.

profile_positions.description: Assisted fertility is a key driver for the life of most intended parents, but the regulations turn the process into a cumbersome experience, generating anxiety for parents and a tough environment for nurses and doctors to navigate in. It's a platform that's designed to minimize patient stress and empower fertility doctors by providing them with the right information at the right time. It consists of a set of HIPAA compliant multi-tenant applications built with Ruby on Rails and Ember.js and which design leverages behavioral design techniques.
profile_positions.title: FertilityPro - Improving IVF Experiences

profile_positions.description:
A publicity campaign for the World Cup 2018, consisted of an interactive experience where participants could send their energy to the shoes that were later going to be used by Luis Suarez in the world cup.

Developed the electronics and software needed for the solution; it consisted of lights,  sensors, moving parts, and screens synced up to a visual experience.
profile_positions.title: Adidas (Energy to Suárez)

profile_positions.description: Building ERP software for Conaprole, one of the biggest companies in the country. The software enables the company to manage its thousands of resources and dependencies, it's used for daily planning and control of assets. Built with PHP, Javascript and .NET
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Engineer - Team Lead

company.name: Facultad de Arquitectura, Diseño y Urbanismo de la Universidad de la República

profile_positions.description: Maintained the online infrastructure for the university's portals and took part in several internal projects. Developed FORMA; a platform that allows users to register to courses and evaluate the teachers' performance. It enables the administrators to manage the submissions, schedule new course registrations, and handle the course payments. Software developed for Facultad de Arquitectura, Diseño y Urbanismo de la Universidad de la República at first but now being used in several other Universities. Built with PHP and Javascript
profile_positions.title: Fullstack engineer - Webmaster

volunteer_experiences.role: Group Leader working with kids and teenagers. Image area coordinator at Scouts de Uruguay
